## Exercises 12.4 Problem 7

**Find the total differential dz for z = 5x âˆ’ 7y**

$dz = f_x(x, y)dx + f_y(x, y)dy$ 

$f_x(x, y)dx = 5 - 7y$ 

$f_y(x, y)dy = 5x - 7$

$dz = 5 - 7y + 5x - 7 = 5x - 7y - 2$
